column5: Wondering what the driving conditions are like off of Willow beach?  Any pressure cracks that may not be passable? Thickness of ice is good for driving on?  Thanks in advance.

I'm not going to tell you its safe to drive out.....because it never really is. Out from willow you can get to the snake island shoal without crossing the nasty crack. I won't drive over it, but lots of guys are. There is lots of water to fish without going over it.......  Good ice (15") and not much snow...so travelling is great right now.  Sinker
def lots of ice for your truck....went over the crack out of jackson....some of the best fishing to be had is many km passed the crack
